data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cai, Wanzhi, Taylor, Steven J. (2006): Lentireduvius, a new genus of Peiratinae from Brazil, with a key to the New World genera (Hemiptera: Reduviidae). Zootaxa 1360: 51-60, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174680
